page.title: 17INDUSTRY IN AYLESFORD
page.content: 18 companies occupy a growing industrial estate east of Aylesford.Co vary from a multi-national concern,Safeways,to a small packaging Co,Linpac,employing only five people.With the exception of 2 Co all employ less than 60 people.The exceptions are Securicor 420,and Safeways 987.About 1/6 of employees are female.Double glazing,a growing industry,occupies two sites and employs between them 75 people.There are three firms of printers and photo- copiers employing 92 people.Securicor deals in the transport of parcels and cash.They have 50 vehicles in their company.Parcels are collected and sent nationwide and abroad.It is a British firm.It has a sports and social club and private pension scheme.Safeways,a trading organisation is American based and came to Britain in 1962.
